entities.name: veela
entities.description: A group of people with magical powers that can entice men to do their bidding.

entities.name: terrible things
entities.description: Unspecified negative consequences that would occur if the veela stopped dancing.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story who is watching the veela dance.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is concerned about his actions.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Harry's other friend who is frozen in an attitude as if he were about to dive from a springboard.

entities.name: stadium
entities.description: The location where the veela are dancing and Harry is watching.

entities.name: box
entities.description: A raised platform or structure from which Harry is watching the veela dance.

entities.name: music
entities.description: The sound of music that is being played during the veela's dance.

relationships.description: Harry is watching the veela dance.
Hermione is concerned about Harry's actions.
Ron is positioned as if he were about to dive from a springboard in the stadium.
Harry is standing on the box.
The music is associated with the veela's dance.
